en-US.name: Plant Ranger Check
en-US.summary: Check your plant health status using Plant Ranger API
en-US.description: Plant Ranger Check helps you monitor the health of your plants by connecting to the Plant Ranger API. Simply ask "check my plant health" to get a status update on your plants.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Simply say 'check my plant health' to get a status update. The skill connects directly to the Plant Ranger API health endpoint.
